snippet: The final budget bill, to be voted on Tuesday, also includes new measures for improving chronically struggling schools.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo wins compromises from teachers' unions on issues like teacher evaluations and tenure and how to handle underperforming schools.
lead_paragraph: The final budget bill, to be voted on Tuesday, also includes new measures for improving chronically struggling schools.

headline.main: Cuomo Gets Deals on Tenure and Evaluations of Teachers
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Gets Deals on Tenure and Evaluations of Teachers
